alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:58PM CDT until August 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Taylor, or near Dothan, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Grimes, Avon, Memphis, Hollis Dairy Road, Enon, Wilson Mill, Barber and Merritts Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
